decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (SUFF 001 Revision 1 - Received 16/01/2017. Environment Agency Flood Risk Matrix - Received 17/10/2017. Aboricultural Method Statement - Received 12/12/2017.  SUFF 002 Revision 4, SUFF 003 Revision 4, SUFF 004 Revision 4, SUFF 005 Revision 4, SUFF 006 Revision 4, SUFF 007 Revision 4, SUFF 008 Revision 4 - Received 15/01/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey side return and rear extension to the house
